content.question: What caution is given to readers?

choices.label: They are liable for complying with a new law.
There may be a charge in some cases.
Failure to recycle is damaging to the environment.
Older computers may not be recyclable.

content.answer: There may be a charge in some cases.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Determine the meaning of familiar and unfamiliar words.
